'''Ayesha''' {{Lang|ar=عائشة|ar_rm=ʿĀʾishah}} is an [[NPC]] from [[Sumeru]]. She is a [[Spantamad]] in [[Sumeru Akademiya]]. While researching ancient relics, she invented a tool to detect the ancient relics buried underground, and named it "[[Ayesha's Chaos Prospector]]" after herself.
